text: Jérémy Sapina (born 1 February 1985 in Rillieux-la-Pape, Rhône) is a French footballer who last played for GF38, as a central defender.Jérémy Sapina n’est plus Grenoblois‚ gf38.fr, 15 January 2017 ==References== * * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rillieux-la-Pape Category:French footballers Category:AS Nancy players Category:Royal Excel Mouscron players Category:C.S.
